qas.question: What USAF tech school has 31 days of training?
How long is the training for Explosive Ordnance Disposal in the USAF?

answers.text: one year of training with a preliminary school

qas.question: Who conducts the training for Technical Officers in the USAF?
How long does the flight training for the AETC's Nineteenth Air Force last?

context: Training programs vary in length; for example, <a0_0>3M0X1 (Services)<a0_0/> has 31 days of tech school training, while 3E8X1 (Explosive Ordnance Disposal) is <a1_0>one year of training with a preliminary school<a1_0/> and a main school consisting of over 10 separate divisions, sometimes taking students close to two years to complete. Officer technical training conducted by <a2_0>Second Air Force<a2_0/> can also vary by AFSC, while flight training for aeronautically-rated officers conducted by AETC's Nineteenth Air Force can last well in <a3_0>excess of one year<a3_0/>.
